review_text: I went to get my wedding ring sized and they did a great job. I was so inspired by their selection, after the sizing, I got an additional ring customized and love it. Super helpful staff.
Great store. Super helpful and my jewelry was perfect

I took a bracelet in for cleaning that I purchased there many years ago. They were so kind and accommodating. Of course I browsed while I was in there and they have many  eye catching goodies for those in the market. A very reputable family run jewelry  store. They have been there for many many years.  I will be going back to purchase  something very soon.

I am extremely pleased with my rings being
re-sized. They look brand new again 🤩. Extremely pleased with the customer service here. Will definitely be back!
The best jewelry store around. Been going to them for over 20 years. They also do repairs & quickly. I highly recommend!

I went just to have one item fixed and two question whether they could help me with another item. They were extremely helpful. Kept my budget in site and took care of everything I needed. They were professional courteous, and I would recommend them to anyone looking for jewelry or repairs to existing jewelry. I trust them completely.
Omg my experience here was  amazing .  I work closely with one of the sales representatives named Michelle. She was very patient and kind with helping me choose an Engagement band for my partner.

This is by far the best jeweler in Huntington. Sam and his staff are very knowledgeable and professional the price and selection are great and they are excellent on repairs. Highly recommended try them out you will not be disappointed.
Good customer service
The chains are so beautiful and great for anything Gavi was helpful but I wish they can have more options for religious pendants
My family and I have shopped at the Karat shop for years.  Sam gives exceptional customer service no matter the size of the purchase.
Wow! These guys are excellent! Service,product and price are top of the line!

Shopping for engagement rings added a huge amount of stress until we encountered Wendy at the Karat Shop. She took the time to make everything clear and work with us to get exactly what we wanted in our range. I recommend going here because you walk in knowing nothing and walk out with all the info you need and new additions to your family with all the employees there.

The Karate Shop never disappoints! I have been a customer for over 30 years and trust them with my most prized possessions.
The staff is kind, knowledgeable and above all reliable. There is no place I’d rather go!

The best place to get your fine jewelry with exceptional customer service!  I have been going there since my engagement over 25 years ago and every time I go as recently as today I am never disappointed!  The jeweler is outstanding and the staff makes you feel like your family! If I could give more stars I would!

In complete honesty this store gave me the best experience I could imagine for purchasing an engagement ring. My father bought my mother’s engagement ring at The Karat Shop back when they were in their early 20s and he told me that, if the store was still around, I should go and check it out. As a younger guy I had absolutely no idea what I was doing when I first walked into the store, however the staff was extremely knowledgeable and taught me everything I needed to know so that way when I walked out I felt like an expert! Not only was I provided with endless options to achieve what I wanted, I was also pleasantly surprised with how fair the prices were. There was not a single moment where I felt that I was being taken advantage of or “ripped off”. When I figured out what I wanted and agreed on a price, I was able to make a convenient appointment with the jeweler for the following week. They allowed me to sit in front of the jewelers station and watch him create my ring. It was so great to watch, and he really is a magician when it comes to his craft. The entire time I felt very assured that I was going to receive a masterpiece, and at the end my feelings were correct! I received an absolutely gorgeous ring within an hour at a great price! I highly recommend The Karat Shop to anyone who is looking for high quality jewelry, as well as the highest quality of customer service. Thank you to the entire staff for turning this stressful process into a wonderful, fun and easy going journey!
Love the Karat shop. Their customer service is exceptional. Definitely recommend going there for any jewelry.

A close friend of mine sent me here to get new earrings. I dealt with Sam and couldn't be more satisfied with the professionalism he presented and the quality of my new earrings. 10/10 I'm going here for all my jewelry needs from now on.
They know their details, and most important are genuine people in business.

Sam was very helpful, I was able to get in and out within 15 minutes, quality service with quality craftsmanship. You can tell when a business cares about their customers and product, I definitely recommend the shop for any jewelry needs!

I have been a customer at the Karat Shop from the very beginning. I cannot find a single jeweler as honest as Sam and his wonderful staff! They have a unique understanding of style and know what is best for each client. I would definitely recommend The Karat Shop to all my family and friends. Thanks for your hard work, see you very soon!

The Karat Shop on Jericho Tpke is a very friendly and nice place to shop. All workers there are welcoming and always have a smile.
Jewelry is top notch and if there are any problems, they welcome you to come by to remedy your problem. Wonderful experience !
Amazing experience. Never going anywhere else for my jewelry needs!
Incredible pieces, great pricing and unparalleled customer service
The Karat Shop is awesome!  So helpful and friendly and they do beautiful work!
Absolutely fantastic!!! Above and beyond service... I went from a first time customer to a lifetime customer... Highly recommend you shop here
This owner and all employees have the best customer service. They have a huge selection of jewelry and are extremely knowledgeable. My new go to jeweler.
Love dealing with them, they're the best
Most helpful employees, knowledgeable, caring and understanding. This place is amazing and would love to use again!
Professional, kind and great people

The customer service and level of professional is top notch. They were extremely hospitable, time efficient, and trustworthy. I came in to have my rings resized and left as an extremely happy customer. The rings never left my site and the jeweler makes the updates right in front of you. They’ll be my go to place going forward for sure.
The staff were so kind and helpful! It was a pleasure shopping at the Karate Shop I recommend it 100%

I had a second ear piercing done tonight. They were kind and knowledgeable. There was not a big push to buy additional earrings, but we will be back to buy in the near future. We asked to see some additional earnings when I am ready to change earrings, but they put no pressure on us.
The gentleman was very nice to work with for finding what I needed.

Such a warm and welcoming place. I first went to the Karat Shop to fix a clasp on my necklace. Sammy fixed it extremely quickly and for a WAY more affordable price than I could have gotten anywhere else. My husband and I also recently went and purchased a ring, and everyone working was so pleasant and helpful throughout. Would 100% recommend for any and all jewelry needs!
Sam’s the best!!

I would recommend The Karat Shop to every one I know. I had such an amazing experience choosing an engagement ring and everything went by very smoothly. I couldn’t be happier. Sam was amazing with his expertise and advice. I can’t say enough great things about The Karat Shop. Thank you!!!
Overall a great experience

I have been going to The Karat shop for many years. They are always the most helpful and knowledgeable people. The store has a nice selection. From 18 k gold to beautiful diamonds. The owner Sam is a very honest businessman . It has been a local establishment for a long time and you will be in good hands!
Amazing staff that will get you exactly what you need! They treat you like family and provide nothing less than quality. Would recommend them to anyone.

The Karat shop is a jewelry store I have purchased all my jewelry there for many years. They are honest and go out of there way to please the customer whether it’s for repairs or purchasing a new diamond ring.

The staff at the Karat Shop always super sweet and helpful. I love there customer service I was just in this week to pick a special bracelet and I am so happy with it . We
always find something we love. If your looking for a gift for your loved one or yourself stop in and see them.
Thank you Sam and Wendy and everyone else there .
Alyse

Squeezed in a repair after closing time before a holiday.

A++ service. Thank you!

Where to begin? I used the Karat Shop based off of previous recommendations and they did not disappoint. Sam was extremely patient and knowledgeable. He walked me through every possibility for my engagement ring. The end result was beyond my expectations. It was perfect! Thank you again to Sam and the team.

Everyone in this store is amazing! The staff was extremely personable and they took the time to get to know my fiancé & I while we were trying to select our wedding bands. You can tell they carry high quality jewelry and truly care about their customers. 10/10 would recommend others to use this store!
Sam was so friendly and helpful piercing my 2 year olds ears! Super clean, quick, affordable and pleasant! Highly recommend!!

Beautiful selection and exceptional service. I shopped here as a little girl, my husband continued the tradition and bought my engagement ring here. That was 20 years ago and we still love it. I went in recently with an idea of what I wanted for small hoop earrings and they took the time to help me find exactly what I had in mind. We love this shop and will continue to come back again and again.

The total experience at the karat shop is unmatched. Quality service (completely feel like family) matched with quality jewelry (I have created pieces from scratch and shopped their incredible inventory) is only made better by the unbeatable prices. 10/10 each and every visit. We love creating memories at the karat shop.
Love the Karat Shop!!  The most beautiful jewelry and the best, most sincere  and honest associates. No one compares.
I have been shopping at the Karat Shop for many years. The other day my necklace chain broke. Sam took care of me. It was ready the next day and as good as new! I recommend them always!
Very pleasant and helpful

My second visit to your beautiful jewelry shop and once again received outstanding service. Was not sure on what to do about a chain and you assisted me in making the right choice.  I will be sure to share this wonderful experience with family and friends. Thank you once again for your fantastic customer service. 👍 Joan

This is without a doubt the best jewelry store I have ever been in. The store is large and bright with a big selection of quality jewelry. But the real reason for the 5 star review is Sam and his staff including Wendy and Jeannie. They are warm, knowledgeable and really care about the customers. This is why generations of families keep coming back. if you truly want the best The Karat Shop is your only choice!!!!
Sam & his professional staff are just outstanding at what they do, & they care so much about their customers!! We have Developed long lasting friendships with Sam, Wendy & Jeanie.
Employees are very helpful and courteous. I needed my wedding ring resized and they did a beautiful job!

Absolutely love the Karat Shop.  My family’s been using them for YEARS for any jewelry needs.  Not only are they the nicest people, you really do get a bang for your buck. My engagement ring is absolutely stunning, I’ve been back to have it resized and put shods in (I’ve lost weight so I needed to have it cut down after a few months) and I cannot wait to go back for my wedding band!
Very professional and personable. Extremely fair and no pressure environment. Beautiful job.  Will definitely go back.

The Karat shop has been such a HUGE help in my engagement ring process. We originally went and tried rings on with Wendy, who was so kind and sweet! She sat with us for 2 hours explaining everything and showing different stones and bands. When the time came months later, my fiancé went to a friends jeweler and we had a bad experience with them. We came back to the Karat  shop to help since we had such a great experience with them to begin with( and we regretted not choosing them from the start). They have exceeded our expectations and have been so helpful, kind, supportive, informative and so sweet to correct the problems done by the other jeweler. THANK YOU to Wendy, Jeanie, Sam and the setter for being so kind and helpful. We are so excited to come back for our wedding bands and for  future jewelry purchases. Don’t walk, but run to the Karat Shop!
Very friendly; Good advice; Been shopping here for years and plan on returning

I highly recommend Sam from the Karat Shop in Huntington! I shopped around for a few weeks, trying to find the best deal, and Sam made it happen. He is professional, responsive, and down to Earth. He won’t try to rip you off like some other jewelers will do. I will recommend him to all of my friends and family. My brother and I both got our fiancées’ engagement rings from him, and we couldn’t be happier. As an added perk, his quality work is guaranteed and he will resize/fix his product for free!

The Karat Shop is the only jeweler I will go to.  Not only is their jewelry beautiful, but their prices are really reasonable and the entire staff is accommodating.  Sam is the ultimate professional, Jeannie is very knowledgeable and patient.  Their repair work is outstanding.  The Karat Shop is 24 Karat.
Great service and selection!
Recently bought an engagement ring here. Sam was super professional and made the process extremely easy. Great guy!

34 years ago my husband purchased my engagement ring at The Karat Shop and I selected jewelry for our bridal party of 14.  We moved away a year later and recently, while visiting I needed a reputable jeweler.  I immediately thought of The Karat Shop and was thrilled to find they were still in business.  I was thoroughly happy with the repair work the jeweler did, the jewelry selections I was patiently shown, the knowledgeable and personable individuals who assisted me. (Sam and Jeannie you made my experience an exceptional one.) Long Island The Karat Shop is a true “Gem”!!!

I had not been able to get my engagement ring and wedding ring over my knuckle (arthritis) for three years. I had been looking around to have my diamond reset and resize my wedding band. I looked into a couple of jewelry shops but didn’t get much help. Tuesday (today is Thursday) my husband said  “just go get your rings done,” I didn’t know where to go and suggested The Karat Shop. As soon as we walked in Sam greeted us and asked what he could help us with. I told him  I need ring help. He gave us a price to resize both rings and repair my engagement ring. I decided to look at new settings. Sam could not have been more helpful (and also very patient since I didn’t have any idea what I wanted) he helped me find a beautiful setting. He also suggested (much to my husband’s dismay) keeping my original setting and having a gemstone set into it, (husband sees dollar signs). I picked my rings up today and couldn’t be happier, they are beautiful. I can’t wait to show them off.
Excellent customer service , great selection of merchandise  and I cannot wait to tell friends and family about this wonderful Jewlery store
My husband and I were in from out of town and Jeanie helped us out today. She was so sweet and wonderful to work with! We'll definitely be back next time we're in town. Highly recommend!
Great place, great staff!!!! Great quality, we have been customers for over 15 years! Best diamonds in town!

Wendy,wikki,and Sam were all soo sweet in helping me find my beautifulll ringgg💍I loveee ittt sooo muchh and I’m so glad I found them, the best place i ever went too❤️I went to other places to find a ring and they were nothing compared to the Karat shop🫶🏽

I couldn’t be happier with The Karat Shop. They created the most gorgeous ring for me and it was the fasted turnaround ever. Jeanie and Sam worked with me every part of the way to make sure it was perfect. A million stars for them if i could. Thank you!
Sam is wonderful- Have been using Karat Shop since 1994!  Always happy with my purchases and upgrades.  Smiling every time I look at my latest ring refurbishment!

This store is probably one of the best jewelry stores ive been to! Huge selection and very fairly priced.
Sam is really really nice and genuine.
He is extremely knowledgeable about diamonds and is a true professional. Costomer service 10 out of 10
And that is why i leave a 5 star review. Thank you Sam and the whole staff!!! You earned a Costomer for life!!

I’ve been to 10 local jewelers in the area & 5 on 47th street Sam & the Karat Shop is the only guy who was truthful start to finish & educated me fully,  no nonsense no sales routine no tricks no games doesn’t waste your time or money. He’s the only jeweler I would ever do business with there’s a reason he’s been here for 47+ years. Look no further Sam’s your guy he will source anything you need that he doesn’t have already in his extensive show room. Gotta go to Sam!
Same day service,was fantastic,polite,great atmosphere, felt comfortable, prices were great.I will definitely shop and have repairs done  there again.
awesome experience Beautiful jewelry 30 yrs wouldn’t go anywhere else
The sales person was knowledgeable, dynamic and helped me find EXACTLY what I needed. I would recommend them for any jewelry for all ages as well as elegant watch repair. 👍
Amazing customer service and great prices!  Sam was super helpful, and the jeweler did a great job with the adjustments I wanted. Highly recommend!

Love love love this place we were in town for a wedding and was able to get my rings resized there while we waited. Bought them in 1994 from Kinkel Street location. Wonderful store lovely staff!!! Top notch beautiful jewelry and customer service.
I worked with Sam.  He was able to find the exact watch I was looking for.  The Tag Heuer watch had been discontinued and other area jewelers were unable to get the watch.
Personable, quick, and a pleasure to deal with. Clean store and so many beautiful pieces to choose from.
Extremely helpful and kind staff that made sure we were taken care of!!!
Everything went smoothly,would highly recommend going here for your rings!! Thank you Wendy!!

I bought my engagement ring here. This place has a wide selection of different types of jewelry which is a good thing if you don't know what you're looking for. Sam is a pleasure to work with. I'll be coming back here to get my wedding bands as well. If anyone of my friends/family need any type of jewelry, I'll send them Sam's way.

I’ve made a few purchases at the Karat Shop and every time I’ve had a great experience. The staff is so friendly and helpful, and there is always a large selection of great pieces. Looking forward to going back again soon!
Amazing place, family owned ❤️.

Awesome selection! Great service! Very competitive prices! I've been going there for over 30 years and they never dissapoint!
BTW Sam is excellent!!!
Great experience, great education, and prices check out - even lower than how diamond prices online!  Sam was a pleasure to work with!
Amazing jewelry at Fordable prices and amazing staff!

Today I went to pick up my engagement ring and it was perfect! The whole staff was helpful and the owner gave me honest advice, and helped me make changes to the setting that made it perfect. The whole experience was wonderful and I never felt I was being forced out of my price range that I originally had told them. The cherry on top was it was ready in a day with out any issues. I can’t thank this store enough and I highly recommend!
Obsessed with my ring. Sam really goes above and beyond for his clients!!
Great people. Only charged $10 to shorten my silver chain and they did it in 10 minutes. Meanwhile neighboring jewelers quoted between 35-50 with a wait time of more than a week. No comparison
Very friendly staff; Came in to get our engagement ring resized, they were able to do it the same day I called and it was very reasonably priced. Surely will return in the future!
We have been shopping here for over 30 years. Always a pleasant experience!
I  have been shopping at the Karat shop of over 25 year. This is the only place we're I buy jewelry.
Sam and the staff were fantastic! Very personable and knowledgeable. Helped me find the perfect gift for my girlfriend, I’ll definitely be going back.
Unbelievably happy with my engagement ring. Sam did a wonderful job with the setting and it looks flawless. Highly recommend.

Not your run of the mill jewelry store! I go out of my way to get there.  They are expert, their selections are immense and gorgeous!  And get this…..they are reasonable and fair!!!!!  Finally a place with quality and class!
These guys were fantastic. I accidentally broke my wife's chain and they put it together quickly and even polished it up and made it gorgeous and I couldn't believe the price was only twenty bucks.

I went to The Karat Shop to find a wedding band after browsing at a few other jewelry stores.  Sam was so nice to work with.  He offered guidance in regards to matching the band with my engagement ring but did not press me to buy. They have such a great variety so it was easy to find something I love.  I’m very happy and will certainly be a long term customer!
Honest, courteous, pleasant. I highly recommend this fine establishment.
Needed two simple repairs. They’re were done quick and very well done. I highly recommend the karat shop
I needed an item repaired and the people at the Karat shop were very knowledgeable and courteous.  They did a wonderful repair in one day.

I waited until the last minute to purchase a marriage band. San was so instrumental in helping me make a decision. He even apologized because he felt that had he’d been given more time he could ha e saved me some additional money by ordering a less expensive ring. It had to be resized and was told “No Problem”. We’ll  have it the next day.
An absolute pleasure to do business with. Never any pressure. Definitely will be back for any future purchases.
I’ve used The Karat Shop many times and each time have been provided excellent customer service. Not to mention the jewelry is gorgeous!! Definitely would recommend!
Sam and the team here provided an experience I will never forget. My dad came here 30 years ago, I hope to bring my son one day! Thanks very much!!!
Great staff , very knowledgeable!
Sam was incredibly professional and wonderful to work with. Responsive, timely, and all around just simply good at what he does. Couldn't recommend him more.
Highly recommend The Karat shop. Sam gave us the right price and best service. Definitely will be back!

We have been coming to The Karat Shop for years. My husband and I bought our wedding bands there over 35yrs ago. My daughter and son-in-law recently bought their wedding bands there too. The shop is a lovely family owned business. They are very attentive, knowledgeable, patient and kind. Sam the owner has been exceptional to work with. Highly recommend The Karat Shop!

What a pleasure it was at the Karat Shop! Sam was so nice and all of my jewelry looks brand new.  I will definitely have to go back when I have more time to look around.  The jewelry there was GORGEOUS!! Thanks again!!
Staff there is always super helpful! Great selection of jewelry...one of my favorite places to frequent!!! Highly recommend! Jeanie and everyone are all the best! Never disappointed

Stopped by to look for a wedding band for myself. I pretty much knew what I wanted but just wanted to check out some styles. I found the one I wanted but preffered it in a darker color. Sam was able to order the ring for me and have it ready for pick up in a few days. Sam was very helpful and the ring came out exactly how I wanted it!

We had a great experience at the Karat Shop.
Sam and Jeanie were very easy to work with and took there time to find exactly what we were looking for.
I highly recommend The Karat Shop !
Very helpful and patient. I found 4 pearl necklaces for my bridesmaids!  They are beautiful! Thank you!
Friendly, courteous and prompt.
Always helpful and pleasant. Haven't made a major purchase yet, but always very nice.

My family has been going to the Karat Shop for years. Both my brothers, two of my cousins, my best friend and I got our engagement rings from Karat Shop.  The owner was even kind enough to give us each a bottle of champagne for us to celebrate. We’ve all been gone back for different things like wedding bands, necklaces, etc. It’s always nice to go back and work with friendly people. If you haven’t been already I would highly recommend stopping in.

Such a warm and welcoming staff! I would recommend Sam to anyone and everyone. He made the process very simple. I didn't feel rushed or pressured one bit. He explained every question I had in very good details. He listened to me when I was explaining what I was looking for, and was open to all of the ideas that I brought up. He is also really knowledgeable and explained everything about the diamonds that were available. The quality in their work is really remarkable. I was in a specific price range, and to be honest I feel like the ring I got is worth more then what I payed. They really do go above and beyond for their clients. Thank you to all at the Karat Shop!!

Easily a 5/5. I worked with Jeanie on an engagement ring with my fiancé. Jeanie at The Karat Shop was knowledgeable and friendly from the first minute we walked in. We only had a rough idea of what we wanted and Jeanie helped guide us to the perfect ring. I am so happy I found this store and worked with Jeanie, and I look forward to working with her in the future on other pieces. I highly recommend The Karat Shop and Jeanie!

My experience was wonderful! We have been customers for a long time and will continue to be.
Wendy was so helpful and patient with our purchase it was a pleasure!

I Recently purchased an engagement ring and two wedding bands. The whole staff is very nice, friendly and have shown my fiancé and myself excellent customer service. Sam is very knowledgeable and helped me pick out the engagement ring. My fiancé could not be happier. I would recommend coming here over the bigger named stores

Wendy at THE KAROT SHOP -
Nice to see you again and nice doing business with you .
Thanks for the good advice and the good price !!
See you again soon .
All the best,
Artie

The Karat Shop was nothing short of spectacular. I went engagement ring shopping throughout some of NYC and Long Island and can honestly say they were THE MOST helpful, compassionate, fair-priced, and patient with me during the process.

At no point did I ever feel pressured into making a purchase. It never felt like they were trying to make a sale, but rather they tried to help and steer me in the right direction to purchasing the perfect diamond.

I can confidently say I would highly recommend them to anyone who is searching for a piece of jewelry for that special person. They are masters of their trade and truly care about what their customers purchase.

Sammy was a gentleman and his staff was absolutely amazing. Highly highly recommend! Thank you so much!
Fantastic jewelry shop! Best diamonds ever❤️💍 awesome staff. Thank you for fixing my ring! 😍😘
The Karat shop had a great selection, the service was amazing! Wendy and Sam were a pleasure to work with and will definitely be recommending this place to my friends and family :)

I can't thank everyone at The Karat Shop enough. Thank you Wendy for all your help showing me different settings and thank you Sam for finding the perfect stone. I shopped around but in the end it was the amazing staff and pricing that made the decision easy. I never once felt like I was an inconvenience or felt like I was being rushed through the process. I would recommend anyone looking for engagement rings to check them out and from my personal opinion, you won't go anywhere else. By the way, she said yes and in her own words, she's "obsessed" with the ring. Thank you again!
Shopping here is a delightful experience, with great customer service and beautiful jewelry.

I've been dealing with the Karat Shop for over 20 years.
But to no surprise the quality of the service and the Jewelry is
second to none.These people do it the old fashion way they earn it.
I will be there customer for life.
Gary
Second to none. I’ve been going here for decades. Just recently, they helped me pick out an engagement ring for my fiancé. It’s beautiful and was a great value.

Sammy has gone above and beyond for us.  From helping us pick out the perfect diamond for our budget (he brought in so many options as I was looking for a certain heart shape)  right down to a custom setting upgrade 5 years later. Great prices and not at all pushy, he works with you! *highly recommended*
Truly a pleasure to work with. Incredibly helpful and patient. Highly recommend.

From start to finish I had the best experience working with Geenie and Sam. Both were very professional and seemed to have my best interests in mind. I’ve gone to other jewelers to shop around and was unfortunately met with some pushy individuals who only seemed interested in the sale. Needless to say, the engagement ring came out perfect. Geenie had a few additional diamonds sent to the store, just so I could have more options. From there, I was able to compare diamonds and make an informed decision. Zero regrets going to The Karat Shop. My fiancé loves the ring and we will definitely be returning to Geenie and Sam for future purchases!! Thanks TKS!!!

The service by staff is stupendous!
Same with quality and great selection of jewelry!
I was looking for a something a little different from what i was finding at other Jewelry shops. I found the most lovely ring. Amazing customer service!

I came to The Karat shop to have my grandmothers ring made into a necklace. To say it turned out amazing would be a under statement, it is absolutely gorgeous!!!!! They did an awesome job making my vision come true... Thank you so much.
They are the absolute best, great customer service and amazing quality jewelry. I'll definitely be going back!!!
Great service, great prices. Professional. Beautiful jewelry. Sam was very helpful and friendly. Will definitely go back in the future.

well priced,  and possibly the best customer  service I have ever endured. I told them what I was looking for and they were able to a find exactly  what I needed (in many styles and colors no less).  I honestly  felt like I was more than a customer to  them,  I was treated like a friend. This  was one of my best shopping experiences peirod. I will be shopping here again and I already have suggested to  my family and Friends  that they should only be using The Karot Shop for any Jewlery needs

Sammy at The Karat Shop is always the BEST! We've gotten our jewelry here for decades and our children now shop for their important occasions as well. Just had a repair done very quickly and professionally on a 20 year old ring that had the tips of the prongs wear off after daily wearing. I made an appointment and sat for an hour (all of us in masks of course) watching my ring repair being handled so delicately. I highly recommend The Karat Shop in Huntington, it's worth the trip! Their jeweler is quite talented! Thanks Sammy!

The owner of the boutique jewelry store was authentic and genuine. He assisted me with sizing and guidance on deciding what I should purchase for my wife. I cant thank him enough for his artistic skills.
Amazing tennis bracelet, great quality and best service!

Trustworthy business with very nice, helpful people owning and operating the store. Will continue doing business here and wanted to tell others, if you're looking for a great, trustworthy jeweler, you won't be disappointed here!
Jeanie was very helpful and nice. Place is very clean. I would highly recommend this store.
Beautiful work, timely and accommodating. Friendly staff. Was able to get exactly the rings we wanted for our wedding. Highly recommend!
Best service and can’t be beat prices great staff
Very helpful, polite, huge selection and great staff. I would recommend them to anyone who asks from something from an earring to an engagement ring.

Sam and his staff have been nothing but helpful through the experience of getting my wedding bands! After a long awaited reunion I finally got to get them after all this mess with covid! I am so pleased. We will
Be going back for a custom wedding band for my husband! Thank you karate shop!

Extremely knowledgeable professionals here.  They have an amazing selection and super friendly service. They helped me pick out the perfect diamond earrings for my wife.  Highly recommended for all your jewelry needs.

When it comes to jewelry stores there’s seemingly one on every corner and numerous ones in every shopping mall.  If buying a gold charm is in order, then choosing a shop that’s conveniently located to you is the way to go.  However, if shopping for a special diamond or diamond jewelry in general, you will want to choose a REPUTABLE shop that’s HONEST with COMPETITIVE PRICING.  That said, a trip to the Karat Shop located in Huntington, NY is something I highly recommend!

On a personal note, all I can tell anyone who is reading this review is that I’m 54 years old and the Karat Shop has been in business at the same location for as long as I can remember (40+ years I think).  After recently purchasing both a diamond engagement ring and diamond tennis bracelet for my “wife to be” I can sincerely confirm that the Karat Shop’s business model has not changed one bit throughout the years.  They are a low pressure shop with a wide variety of diamonds to choose from; which is all one can ask for!

When shopping for any product or service, “choice is good.”  While I can’t guarantee that you will visit the Karat Shop and find exactly what your looking for, I can certainly guarantee that your friendly visit will be worthwhile when it comes to becoming a more educated shopper of diamonds 😉👍

Went into the store without knowing what I wanted as far as an engagement ring. The staff was so nice , friendly, and informative. I won’t be proposing again BUT if I had to I would go back to the Karat Shop haha. The ring came out so much better than I could’ve ever imagined. We plan on going back for wedding bands as well.
5 out of 5
Very good service good selection good prices
Great customer service. High quality!

My wife and I just met one of the nicest , kindest , most sincere and knowledgeable person in the jewelry business.
Sam was extremely helpful and educated us about the type of diamond ring that we were looking for.
Thank you Sam.
In addition all of  his staff are wonderful.
I highly recommend them to anyone who is looking to have a great experience purchasing quality jewelry from a wonderful facility.
This is the third time shopping at the karat shop. Sammy and Wendy are phenomenal and are extremely helpful!!! They truly care about their customers.

I have been to many jewelry stores, the Karet shop was by far the most helpful and friendly.  They had beautiful merchandise at reasonable prices.  The sales people are so friendly and very honest when trying to help me in my price range, never trying to talk me into something I couldn’t afford. That has happened in many other jewelry store I have been to.  The salesperson I delt with , Wendy was a very friendly woman that really knew about jewelry. She is extremely helpful and her boss Sammy was willing to work with me on a payment plan. If you want quality jewelry with avast inventory of fine jewelry that’s my number one choice.

The whole crew are lovely and down to earth people! VERY workable, Patience, willing to adjust to busy schedules. Great prices that you can’t beat! I recommend this establishment! Thank you very much Jeanie and Sammy!!!
Excellent service and work
Very accommodating with one of the best selections I’ve seen outside the diamond district in Manhattan.
Great selection with reasonable prices. Staff is friendly, helpful,  and attentive.

I would recommend The Karat Shop to anyone looking for gorgeous jewelry in an elegant, beautiful setting. The displays are irresistible! Each piece is stunning and unique! The customer service is impeccable. Wendy is wonderful- so friendly and helpful- she gives her undivided attention and makes sure her customers will love their purchase. Also, so grateful to Sammy - so warm and professional!

The Karat Shop did an outstanding job on my jewelry repairs. All of my items looked brand new. Thank you so much!  Wendy helped me and she was so helpful and friendly!  She is a true gem (no pun intended). I will be back soon!  A++++

I had shopped a few stores for a xmas gift. The Karat shop had exactly what I had in mind for my wife Two of the saleswomen helped me out and were extremely knowledgeable about what they were sellind. Unlike the other places I shopped ,I was surprised to learn that the owner is actually there almost every day.he was also helpful and so super nice!  The price and quality here was the best as well  I highly recommend this place. They are awesome!
Thanks Karat Shop !
Sam is fantastic! He's warm, very responsive, and always goes the extra mile to make sure his customers are satisfied. Its not easy to find a trustworthy jeweler, but hes a true diamond in the rough!
Sam was amazing to deal with! They have beautiful peices, great prices and exceptional customer service. My family used them too and they were thrilled.
Great quality pieces and super friendly and knowledgable staff! Highly recommend.

If you want high quality jewelry and pleasant shopping experience than this is the place to go. Most jewelry stores that I have gone to offer poor customer service and upsells. The staff here is very well-informed and professional. Sam helped me pick out and custom create most beautiful pieces while working with my budget and without compromising the quality. He is very knowledgeable, patient and easy to work with. Most importantly he will spend time with you to make sure that you are 100%  happy with your purchase. Highly recommend Sam and his team.
The jewelry store that can do anything!! Will be doing all my buying here
Highly recommend this jewelry store! The pieces are gorgeous, staff is knowledgeable and friendly. Sam is an expert and I will continue to come here for my jewelry needs!
The best diamond store in the area good service good people

Excellent staff! Excellent service!

Huge selection and .. if you don't see something in the display case that you love, they'll custom design something for you.

Sales. (Engagement rings. Wedding bands. Necklaces. Braceles Earrings.)

Service. (Cleaning. Watch batteries. Sizing.)

Highly recommended!

The Karat shop had an enormous selection and quality rings that were able to fit my budget. I spoke with Sam and he was very friendly and easygoing. He showcased a few rings to me that I had a mild interest in. I ended up buying one that had an emerald gemstone on it. Just what my wife wanted. I highly recommend this place.

The Karat Shop was so accommodating to me. They showed me a lot of their merchandise up close and allowed me to take pictures so I had something to reference to. Would recommend to anyone looking for high quality jewelry.

I went to The Karat Shop a few days ago and had a good experience with the sales representatives. They were knowledgeable and very patient with me. I would recommend this store for the dependability and the staff's extensive knowledge on each piece of merchandise

I just recently paid a visit to The Karat shop and they were exceedingly professional. They had a wide selection of merchandise to select from and I had plenty of time to find the right ring I wanted. I came in here to browse to get an idea of the type of ring I'd want for my future wedding. Sam was very sweet and accommodating towards me and I will take that into consideration when recommending people to this shop! Thanks again!

Had two pieces repaired and within a month both pieces were back in for repair  . I asked the sales women if I can have half of my original bill refunded for my inconvenience and as good customer service and her rely was " well we are not charging you this time."  I laughed and said I will never do business with them again.

Sam at the Karat Shop was the BEST possible salesman, and his staff is excellent. He was the perfect combination of helpful and patient. He helped me make a decision without being pushy. In addition to the great people, his selection is unebelievable. I HIGHLY recommend the Karat Shop. LOVE my ring and people stop me to compliment it.
Love this place, the staff is very knowledgeable and the prices are always right. The karat shop has jewelry for every occasion, I will be definitely coming back and referring my friends and family!
Sam was able to help me out when I wanted to sell some jewelry. He gave me a good price on my stone. It helped me out so I could go Christmas shopping!
